testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

He has delivered bug free stories, He is a great team player who is always ready to help team members, He has handled the stories very efficiently, He has always resolved the escalations/issues with in the timeframe, He has always delivered stories withinthe timeline.  Keep up the good work!
